fleetCategories.title: Available Categories — Our Fleet
fleetCategories.subtitle: Choose the category that fits your needs and book with a €49 deposit. All cars include full insurance with no excess.

list.title: Small Category
list.desc: Compact and fuel-efficient — ideal for 2–4 people.

list.title: Medium Category
list.desc: More space & comfort for daily use and short trips.

list.title: Compact / Hatchback
list.desc: Balanced space & economy — great for short getaways.

list.title: SUV / Crossover
list.desc: High visibility & comfort — perfect for family holidays.

fleetCategory.why1: Comfort & safety for your daily needs

mikri-katigoria-enoikiaseis-autokiniton-.description: Economical & agile for the city: easy parking, low consumption and comfort for 2–4 people.

megali-katigoria-enoikiaseis-autokiniton.description: Space, comfort and extra equipment for relaxed trips in and out of the city.
